textBeforeTable: Scouting Audibles Bio Videos Statistics Updates March 16 marks the beginning of spring football as new Florida head coach Jim McElwain will get to coach the Gators on the practice field for the first time. As practice soon approaches and a new era in UF football begins, Inside the Gators will take a position-by-position look at Florida's roster....[details] The Latest: Spring Preview: Playmakers needed — 3/4/2015   Luke Ancrum Raphael Andrades Alex Anzalone Alvin Bailey Matthew Bowden Caleb Brantley Taven Bryan Nick Buchanan Jonathan Bullard Antonio Callaway Khairi Clark Bryan Cox Jr. Jordan Cronkrite Jarrad Davis Duke Dawson Luke Del Rio Richerd Desir-Jones Blair Diamond Cameron Dillard Travaris Dorsey Ahmad Fulwood DeAndre Goolsby Josh Grady Will Grier Austin Hardin Vernon Hargreaves III Kavaris Harkless Anthony Harrell Marcell Harris Treon Harris Mark Herndon Thomas Holley Martez Ivey Joey Ivie
